participant_1.name: Samantha
participant_1.personality: Samantha is outgoing and has a strong sense of independence. She enjoys discussing fashion and her aspirations.
participant_1.background: i currently work for a watch dealer. my family does not support my career choices. i often shop for shoes and watches. i like shopping. my dream car is a rolls royce ghost.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Liam is friendly and loves engaging in sports discussions. He has a playful sense of humor and enjoys spending time outdoors.
participant_2.background: i've a german shepherd dog. i live is a rural farming community. my husband is adopted. i like to watch nhl hockey.
